reviews.comments: Vale la pena 100%
La experiencia fue excelente . Muy buen dpto y muy buena la atención . Totalmente recomendable . Gracias

reviewer.first_name: Hugo M. Pesa Y Cia S.R.L.
reviewer.host_name: Hugo M. Pesa Y Cia S.R.L.

reviews.comments: La estadía fue impecable, el departamento supero las expectativas, es más fácil cuando se trata con gente seria y confiable como Sergio. La ubicación es inmejorable y el departamento espectacular
Un departamento muy recomendable.
El apartamento está excelentemente ubicado tiene mucho estilo y comodidad!
100% recomendable para 2 parejas
El apartamento es realmente hermoso. Muy cómodo y el entorno es ideal. Excelente en todo sentido lo recomiendo al 100 por 100.

El apartamento esta muy bien ubicado,muchos restaurantes alrededor, un supermercado,cerca de la estacion del subte, este te ayudara a acercarte a los lugares turisticos para conocer buenos aires.
El apartamento cumplio mi expectativa, un lugar muy comodo,agradable,es muy limpio y seguro. Cuando vuelva a buenos aires no dudare en contactar a sergio. El apto y la ciudad de buenos aires la recomiendo 100%.
Excelente!

Muy buenas recepcion y explicacion  del uso y servicio disponible.
Muy recomendable, lugar muy bonito y acogedor.

El departamento es MUY lindo, funcional y por sobre todo cómodo. La ubicación es excelente, muchos bares y restaurantes buenos cerca. La panadería que esta al lado es altamente recomendable!! . Sergio fue un anfitrión genial, nos dio toda la información que necesitábamos y estuvo a disposición. Recomiendo el departamento sin dudar, y lo elegiría para mi próxima estadía en Buenos Aires!

Hemos pasado 3 días estupendos en Buenos Aires. El piso de Sergio, además de ser muy agradable, se encuentra en una de las mejores zonas de BA; zona tranquila pero a la vez con mucha vida (restaurantes de diseño y de variedad culinaria, bares de diversos tipos, tiendas y boutiques...). Cómodamente se puede llegar a los principales puntos de interés de la ciudad. Por otro lado, el piso es muy bonito y limpio con una vista increíble sobre BA. Por otro lado, la atención y ayuda de Sergio antes de nuestra llagada así como su rápida respuesta a cuestiones varias, ha sido de gran ayuda.

Alquile este piso con mis tres hijas y fueron los  mejores días que tenia en Buenos Aires. La vista es increíble desde el living y te permite quedar por la noche a dentro del piso con la impresión dominar a la ciudad; Todo esta muy bien equipado y super lindo; Es la impresión de un hotel de lujo pero con la mitad del precio. Ademas Sergio fue muy amable permitiéndonos ser mas flexible con los horarios y todo así que lo recomendó a tope para cualquier persona que quiere aprovechar del mejor piso relación calidad-precio de este barrio !! Maria
reviews.response:
Gracias Marie, los espero la proxima
Saludos Sergio

reviews.comments:
A great place to stay. An easy walk to Plaza Serrano and the underground tube is 7 minutes walk down the sane street. You can get anywhere in the city so easily! 
Sergio is an incredible host. Attentive and organised and everything went absolutely smoothly. Not a glitch with any aspect. The place is great. We used the pool on rooftop and used the balcony bath daily. Loved Buenos Aires. One of the highlights was contacting Delta Unplugged ( check out their (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) page or website or through TripAdvisor) who offer Parana Delta private tours on their boat. We got a private Taxi from the apartment all the way to Tigre and then had an amazing day in the delta. Other highlights was Plaza De Mayo on Thursday when the mothers of The Disappeared meet and march. Get out to San Telmo market too. All in all we had a fantastic time at this apartment and gave it and Sergio a full 5 stars. Thank you Sergio!

Great host and great place. Very nice neighborhood. We walked for hours discovering new restaurants stores and buildings. Fashionable people and great architecture. Found our favorite coffee place nearby and they had amazing pastries. Would love to stay again.....also, the house is beautiful and clean. Very modern. Nice design touch. Great view of the neighborhood. A treat.
If you like nice design and a clean stylish apartment then this place is for you.

Sergio's residence is in a really wonderful location, and it is both stylish and comfortable.  We loved the balconies for a glass of wine at night and the pool on the roof to cool down on a hot day.    Sergio was wonderful at communicating with us and ensuring everything was perfect.   Would definitely recommend!

Sergio's place was really great, clean and in a fantastic part of town. He met me exactly when I arrived, was very communicative and helpful. There is more around here than you can probably check out in a few days, but it really is a fun neighborhood. Only good things to say!
Located in Palermo Hollywood, it has great views of the city as well as nice vibe! The apartment is modern, spacious and well lit!

I would come back to this apartment on a future visit to BA in a heartbeat. The location was great: just stroll down Goritti street for a huge number of bars/restaurants/cool stores, etc. There is also a great bakery right next door—and a gelato store across the street.

The apartment itself was absolutely wonderful. The view is great. There is a second shower and tub on the balcony (and still private, as there are no nearby buildings tall enough to see in) which is a nice touch.

Internet is reliable, but at 3MBPS down, 0.3 up, it will be slow if you need to upload any non-text based content.

The building is very safe and in a calm residential neighborhood. There is also a grocery store half a block away. 

Serge was great and stayed in touch for the duration of the visit. We fell in love with BA, and will be back—and this is where we will stay again.
As the pictures...great neighborhood...recommend this place to others for sure

Schönes Appartment in schönem und sicheren Stadtteil von BA. Perfekt geeignet um von dort aus ein paar Tage die Stadt zu genießen. Super Ausblick auf die Stadt, sogar direkt vom Bett aus. Absolut sicher durch Hauswart. Gepäckaufbewahrung am Abflugtag hat problemlos geklappt. Sehr zu empfehlen.
Great place in an amazing location. I felt very safe in Sergio's place and we were very close to a bunch of great restaurants.
Fantastic location and fabulous apartment. Perfect for 2 couples or a family.
Very good location, great apartment, excellent host.

Apartamento fantástico como anunciado. Camas confortáveis, limpo e vista espetacular. Localização perfeita, restaurantes deliciosos, padarias na mesma rua. Comunicação com o Sérgio foi muito boa e tranquila. Adoramos. Obrigada por tudo Sérgio!

Sergio was fantastic.   I had flight cancellations arriving and departing, and he was extremely flexible and patient with my constantly changing travel plans.  On top of that, the apartment was beautiful, super clean, and in a great neighbourhood for walking to restaurants, bars, and shops.  I'd highly recommend staying here and with Sergio as your host.

Our stay was very enjoyable, we loved the views out over the city especially at night time.
Sergio was very pleasant and easy to deal with.
We loved that there were plenty of restaurants nearby that offered a good choice of different cuisines.
The property itself was perfect for our requirements, very secure with a police presence in the area.
I would be more than happy to return in the future.
Very nice place.
Sergio's place is great.  It was spacious, clean and well appointed.  The location is great and makes a perfect base to explore the city.
Lovely place.   Will stay again.
Really good host.
Nice place, good location.
Very nice place to stay, in a safe location in Buenos Aires.

Sergio's place is the nicest Airbnb apartment I have stayed in. Phenomenal view of the city. Walking distance from a bunch of good restaurants and cafes. Communication with Sergio was easy before hand. Would definitely recommend.

Un posto bellissimo nel quartiere modaiolo di Palermo, con tanta vita sia di giorno che di notte. L'appartamento su due piani, arredato modernamente e con due camere al piano superiore, offre una vista incantevole su Buenos Aires  senza essere rumoroso. Al piano superiore anche una piccola piscina, sicuramente piacevolissima d'estate.  Tutto intorno all'edifico c'é tutto quello che puó servire in vacanza, dal panificio, al supermercato, al fruttivendolo ed alla birreria appena sotto casa, fino a locali e negozi di tutti i generi nelle immediate vicinanze. A pochi minuti ci sono Plaza Italia e i favolosi giardini di Buenos Aires, con il metro o con il taxi si raggiunge velocemente il centro.
Consigliatissimo!

Sergio was great and really easy to deal with. The apartment is in a good area. It was handy to have the bakery and bar just downstairs. The master bedroom has awesome views although second bedroom is quite small and dark. The water pressure in the shower is very low and the toilets didn't flush well. Otherwise we really enjoyed our stay.
Great location, beautiful apartment, and accommodating host. Highly recommend.
Very comfortable condo with amazing views. Worth the $$, would stay again.
Excellent stay. Attentive host. Incredible place.
What an awesome stay, central, clean with great views of the city. Trying sleeping with the curtains open in the main bedroom.

Sergio's apartment was really beautiful. We were two young girls travelling round South America alone so safety was a key issue for us and of course some luxury after we had just come from the Amazon in Peru! In terms of location and comfort, you really won't get any better than this and there are so many shops and bars around to keep you occupied at any time of day. 
We had a slight issue with taxi money on the way from the airport as all of the case machines were empty and we couldn't pay the driver (we understand that Argentinians withdraw cash on Fridays and the ATMs run out so with our arrival on a Sunday we were pretty stuck) but fortunately Sergio's friend Mariano  came to the rescue and very kindly paid our taxi on arrival. This was of course not expected or required but was a kind gesture, for which we were so grateful. If you are coming to BA, you must stay here. The check in and check out process was also very straightforward and the views from the balcony....well there were absolutely incredible. 
thanks Sergio!
Lisa and Rebecca

The apartment was very comfortable and seemed even bigger since it is two stories. It is well stocked and nicely decorated. The view from the balconies is great. Sergio was very easy to work with and check in and check out were a snap. The neighborhood is full of great restaurants and bars. It is an easy 10 or 15 minute walk to the subway station or hop on hop off bus.
Great place to stay! Me and my 2 girlfriends thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Sergio's place in BA. The neighborhood is hip and fun with many restaurants and bars. Would highly recommend staying here!

Dear Mr. Sergio(URL HIDDEN)greatly appreciate your kindness and everything you have done to help my trip more comfortable and more interesting.I really like your apartment that close to restaurant, bakery shop, grocery store,... and the most important thing is the safety. I greatly appreciate the guy who you sent to your apartment to show us how to operate everything in your place. Once again I want to to say thank you very much for your help(URL HIDDEN) Loan Nguyen.
Can't imagine a better place to stay. Unbelievable duplex with great views and easy check in, check out.

Ideal location in a great neighborhood. 
The bakery downstairs one door over is stellar. Highly recommend the empanadas for breakfast.
Sergios place is great. Very nice views and lots of restaraunts nearby.

The apartment is in a very nice modern building in a great part of the city. The subway is about 7 minute walk. Many wonderful bars and restaurants within a short walking distance. For those like us that enjoy working out even while on vacation there is a great modern gym nearby within a couple of blocks.

Tive minha primeira experiência no airbnb com o apartamento do Sergio. Gostei muito da estadia, amei o apartamento e a localização, com ótimos restaurantes e padarias próximos. A internet funcionou super bem e o ar-condicionado foi fundamental para o calorão que encontramos em Buenos Aires. Valeu super à pena!

Sergio's flat was wonderful. Clean, comfortable and well equipped. Sergio left a lot of details to aid our stay. We met him on our arrival and he very kindly treated us to breakfast in the lovely cafe next door!  A great few days to finish our S.American experience.
Very nice. Located near lots of bars and restaurants.  Just like the pictures.  Was clean and great for the price. Would recommend place to anyone!

Sergio's place is in a great location. The view from the balcony is unbelievable. Everything as described. The only thing we missed was a better equipped kitchen, it was difficult to cook dinner as only basics were available and we had to buy all spices etc. However, we left some of it there, so maybe the next renters can use it :)
Nice quiet safe neighbourhood

We had a great time in Palermo staying at Sergio's place. The panaderia and the cafe across the street were both excellent as was the brewery. Really appreciated the air conditioning and blackout curtains because the sun was quite hot blasting in the morning. Took a lovely bath in the tub on the balcony after walking around all day while the family went for a dip in the small rooftop pool.
Sergio was a fantastic host and the condo/apt is absolutely wonderful in all aspects such as location, security, cleanliness, views, etc. I would highly recommend staying here.
Ce duplex est très agréable et situé dans un quartier vivant et à la mode, Palermo Hollywood. Il est parfait pour 4 personnes, et Sergio est très disponible pour conseiller.
Was a comfortable stay located in a great location. Sergio's assistant was there for our arrival and walked us through explaining the features...very helpful. Good value in Palermo Hollywood.

We loved this apartment!!!!
The area is beautiful and safe.  Restaurants are at walking distance and the view from the deck is beautiful.  The host,  sergio, thought of everything and had everything available for us when we got there. I can't wait to go back!!! Argentina is beautiful!!

Sergio helped us organise a driver from the airport and the doorman was there to greet us and show is around. 
The apartment is in a great area with heaps of bars and restaurants. It has a nice balcony to hang out in and is very nice. 
Sergio leaves a folder with recommendations and services around the area. 
Lovely place and great host. Recommended!

Easy to book. Sergio was very accommodating and responsive to questions. The apartment is in a great location with loads of bars a restaurants and a great bakery downstairs. The layout of the apartment is ideal and it has good views. I would recommend if staying in the city.

Foi Excelente a estadia! Uma localização privilegiada dentro do Palermo! O apartamento em si até supera as expectativas quando se comparado as fotos e descrição!!! Recomendo a todos!!!Tudo exatamente como combinado! Obrigado Sergio!
Sergio's Penthouse is an amazing apartment in a fantastic location. Sergio was great to deal with and I would highly recommend staying here

Sergio was an excellent host, he communicated very well and even had someone at the apartment to show us everything at check in.  He even allowed us a late check out given our flight was later in the day.  I would absolutely stay here again.
Sergio was a great host! My stay was comfortable and pleasant. I would highly recommend.
EXCELLENT localization and apartament!
Perfect place, host and location. Everything ran like clockwork. Such a professional operation and enjoyable place to stay. Gracias!!

A great apartment in a good location.  It is very clean & modern, everything you need for a comfortable stay away from home. More bath towels would have been nice, we had 4 towels between 3 adults for 6 days.  Be careful with the washing machine too, it doesn't dissolve the washing powder.
Thanks for accommodating us Sergio, next time we are in your area we will definitely be staying here again.
Excellent apartment in a great location. Sergio was extremely responsive and welcoming. The apartment was gorgeous. Highly recommended!

Sergio was a great host and made himself available whenever we needed him. The place was great and located in one of the best and most hip areas of Buenos Aires (Palermo Hollywood). Most bars and clubs worth going out to are in this area, just a couple of blocks away from the apartment. Greatly recommend!
Great house in awesome location with panoramic views of the city from pretty much every room. This is where you want to stay when in Buenos Aires. Thank you Sergio for being a great host!

Stunning apartment in a great neighborhood. Loved the views from all rooms and you must check out the rooftop as well. Super clean and with all the amenities you need. Sergio was excellent in his communication too and assisted us with any questions we had. Definitely would stay there again.

Nossa estadia no apartamento foi incrível. Ele é simplesmente idêntico ao a foto, ou seja, lindo, extremamente bem decorado, dono de uma vista incrível, com todos os itens de cozinha/cama/banho necessários. Acredito que seja o melhor bairro de Buenos Aires, com muitos restaurantes e bares.  Além disso, o Sergio e sua esposa são gentis e prepararam uma pasta com muitas referências de cada bairro, dicas de locais e passeios. Foi excelente! Recomendo
Nice apartment with great location, clean and modern design. The restaurant Sergio recommended is fantastic!
Very clean apartment, just a short taxi ride away from tourist spots! Two gluten free restaurants within walking distance. Lovely place to stay!
Sergio nos recebeu muito bem e nos deu dicas muito legais! Foi muito atencioso. O bairro é um dos melhores que tem em Buenos (URL HIDDEN) muitos restaurantes e bares.

Very nice condo in a great part of town with everything very easy to access! would definitely stay again. One bedroom is clearly superior to the other however with views, patio, etc. Something to consider if staying with friends but does not mean the place isn't very nice anyways!
Outstanding location and amazing place
Gostamos muito. Lugar extremamente agradável, bairro muito gostoso com vários restaurantes perto e o atendimento do Sérgio impecável

My wife and I have just returned from our trip to Argentina and we already miss BA and this wonderful duplex apartment.  The space is exactly as pictured in Sergio's AirBnB listing.  The main floor has the living space, a terrace which overlooks a view of Palermo Hollywood, a half bath, and a small but workable kitchen.  The bedrooms are on the upper floor. The master bedroom shares the same view as the main floor. It opens out onto a terrace with an outdoor shower.  The second bedroom is smaller and doesn't have a view or a terrace.  Since it was just the 2 of us, we used the second bedroom to store our luggage and    cold weather gear for a brief trip to Patagonia.  The space suited us perfectly.  Throughout our month-long stay, we continually talked about how lucky we were to have rented the apartment.  

We love the neighborhood. The building's location is in the heart of Palermo Hollywood, and it's a short walk to Palermo Soho.  There is a wonderful bakery/coffee bar downstairs, and no shortage of good restaurants within a few blocks.  

Be advised that there is also a very lively artisanal beer bar immediately next door to the entrance to building.  The entrance to the apartment is on the 5th floor (4th floor on the elevator button but the ground floor is counted as zero), so the bar's late night revelry was never a problem for us, but we could hear it.  (Bedrooms are on what would be considered the 6th floor.)

Sergio was a great host, and we would rent from him again without hesitation.
Sergio was welcoming. Everything on the description was accurate. My friends and I loved Sergio's apartment. The neighborhood was quiet and friendly. Everything was within walking distance.

We loved to stay at Sergio's place, we had an amazig time.
The appartment wes extremely clean, nice and looked like in the pictures.
We will stay again at his place in a week from now and can only recommend it.

It was a great privilege to stay at Sergio's amazing apartment. The reception was perfect, the city view and stylish environment exceptional. We loved the neighbourhood and will miss Buenos Aires.  If we ever return we would love to stay there again.

We loved this beautiful apartment! You can find everything what is needed to make your stay comfortable. The area around the apartment is fantastic. A lot of restaurants, bars and shops. It is the best place to stay in Buenos Aires. The apartment has wonderful views around the city. It was hot (close to 40 degrees) during our stay in BA but the air condition makes it feels good and relaxed. The doorman from the apartment building was very friendly. The kitchen is very well equipt, the balconies are amazing. You can enjoy the souround views over the city while your are lying in bed. We defenitly would book this apartment again! Thank you, Sergio :-)

Beautifully-furnished apartment with absolutely stunning views across Buenos Aires.  Although Sergio couldn't receive us personally, we were received by the lovely Silvia who was waiting in the apartment when we arrived.  Excellent boutique cafés and restaurants below the apartment and plenty others within a couple of blocks.  We will definitely be in touch again next time we visit the city!

We loved the apartment and neighborhood. Sergio was a great host. Even though we did not meet him in person , he responded graciously to our questions and was always available and prompt. I would recommend this apartment to anyone wanting to be in the Palermo district.

Sergio's picture reflects his personality exactly: friendly and fun, but serious about providing excellent accommodation. He spent a good deal of time with us right from the start, orienting us to the unit and the neighbourhood.  We stayed for two months and would be hard-pressed to find a more comfortable unit, a better view, or a better Buenos Airean neighbourhood.  Everything fell into place for us.  Even the porter/building manager Julio is the kindest guy around.  Any issue we had, he dealt with asap.  The best panaderia in town is next door.

This was the first time I have booked accommodation through Airbnb and to be honest I was a little nervous. However dealing with Sergio and being welcomed to his amazing Penthouse put all my concerns to rest. 
The apartment if possible was even better than it looked in the pictures, everything was spotless and very well set up for everything we needed for our stay.
The location was outstanding and walking distance to numerous bars and restaurants. The boutique beer bar downstairs was a hit with my husband and we became big fans of pastries from the corner cafe.
Sergio made us feel very welcome and was on hand when needed to help us with any questions we had.
Don't hesitate to book if you are looking for a stunning place to stay with breathtaking views of the city. You won't be disappointed.
Rebecca - Sydney

Sergio made my group feel very welcome. We had an easy and smooth check-in process once we arrived in Buenos Aires. The apartment has fantastic views of the city from its terrace. The inside was spacious and comfortable for our group of 4! 

I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Buenos Aires.

I had a terrific stay at Sergio's place. It's great apartment in a perfect location. Sergio was a fantastic host who made sure that everything went smooth with our stay. Thanks again! I can definitely recommend this place for your stay in Buenos Aires.

Sergio's penthouse was amazing! From the views to the neighborhood. I couldn't of chosen a better property. Everything you need to know about the area and building is written down for you. Sergio was out of town but his friend Mariano checked me in and showed me everything I needed to know. Everything went very smooth and communication with Sergio couldn't of been better. I hope to return. Friendly doorman too!

We loved this apartment and the Palermo area it is in.  The apartment is modern with all of the mod-cons.  Beautifully appointed with a full kitchen and beautiful bath, living area, and balconies (incl hot tub) overlooking the city.
Palermo is full of cool cafes and shops - you'd have to spend weeks or months just to try them all.  Beyond Palermo we tended to walk everywhere, though we did catch Subte some days (beware that Subte stops at 11pm which is weird for a city where people don't eat dinner till 10 or 11 pm).  Sergio was super helpful - emailing beforehand and answering all emails promptly.  Although he wasn't in BA when we stayed, he arranged for a friend (Mariano) to meet us - he too was super helpful.  They helped with exchanging USD both when we arrived as well as later in our stay.  The apartment also has a laundry (if you don't want to use a service in the neighbourhood) - which was also great.. there is a mini-market a block away for necessities.

We can't recommend this apartment more highly!

The best place I could ever pick the location is blocks away from plaza Serrano on your way to it you have a lot of very cute restaurants also clubs are around the corner too and next door is a bakery also a beer pub !! Can't go wrong Sergio was very nice and helpful too he recommended a couple of places and in his apartment he have a folder with all the things that you may need including 24 hours pharmacy hospitals Togo restaurants we love the place we definitely going back !!!!!

Exceptional apartment that elevated my experience of B.A. It was very clean, comfortable and well equipt. The only bad thing about it was my friend and I had to leave it each day to go exploring the city :) 

Sergio was very professional ensuring no delays for key handover meaning a seamless arrival with minimal disruption after long travel. Lots of local info provided, and always in contact if needed/reliable.

The positioning of the apartment is second to none- very very close to 3 top recommended bars in town, lots of cafes and restaurants meaning it was a great base to explore but also feel part of the area for local experience.

Sergio was great! The place was beautiful and he was super helpful whenever we needed help with something. He helped us exchange our US dollars into pesos and made our stay very welcoming. The photos are very accurate as to the look of the apartment. I definitely recommend the apartment and Sergio!

The apartment was fantastic! Beautiful views, an amazing location and neighborhood. Located on top of a great beer bar and an awesome cafe & bakery. We had a great time in Sergio's beautiful apartment.

When we arrived Mariano gave us a great tour and explained the area to us in great detail. (Very Helpful!) 

Had a great time in Palermo thanks in part to this amazing apartment.

Cheers!

We stayed for three nights in August. The apartment is very nice and Sergio was very accommodating of our late check in and early check out. There is also a binder full of restaurant/bar suggestions for Buenos Aires and a number of guide books scattered around the apartment which were helpful. We would definitely recommend staying here.

I had such a great time staying at Sergio's place in Palermo. It's the perfect location for an American tourist to live in while visiting BA. The apartment was great, clean, and has spectacular views.

Localização perfeita, excelentes condições de habitação com tecnologia e bom Wi-Fi.
Uma excelente Padaria no r/C e uma série de bons e excelentes  restaurantes, bares e galerias. 
Um excelente Anfitrião porque ausente, mas presente, sempre...
Absolutamente a repetir .
Great place. Great help from Sergio. Highly recommended.
O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos. A vista é maravilhosa. O chuveiro funciona bem. Tudo perfeito. O Sergio e a esposa são (EMAIL HIDDEN) certeza recomendo.
